- Floor type: Laminate/engineered wood flooring with oak-like grain; likely floating installation over underlayment.  
- Damage: Several planks chipped with veneer peeling; one larger gouge exposing lighter core material.  
- Location: Interior living area floor (as shown in photo).  
- Condition: No visible water stains, cupping, or warping in this view.  
- Recommendation: Replace the damaged planks; inspect adjacent planks for additional damage and verify underlayment/subfloor condition during repair.
